snippet.title: Mosaic Teaser
snippet.description:
Mosaic is a strange story driven adventure game about our repetitive urban lives, and being a small part in a large system.
It's being developed by Krillbite Studio (developers of Among the Sleep) and is set for release on PC, Mac & Linux during 2017.
Learn more on: http://www.themosaicgame.com
